title: Conferences/Workshops
body:
Conferences/Workshops List of conferences/workshops which are relevant and useful for Tech enthusiasts and practitioners.
Table of Contents  September 2021 October 2021 November 2021 December 2021 Missing any conference?  September 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Spring One 2021 1, 2 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Kafka Summit Americas 2021 14, 15 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Azure Cloud Summit 13 - 23 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) GMT    AWS Startup Day (Women Founders Edition) 22 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    AWS Summit (Washington DC) 28, 29 Sep 2021 Register Washington EST    AWSome Day 30 Sep 2021 Register Virtual (Free) IST     October 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     VM World 2021 5-7 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Cloud Quizing Challenge (Azure) 8 Oct - 17 Dec 2021 Register Virtual (Free) IST    Kubecon North America 2021. 11-15 Oct 2021 Register Los Angeles PST    All Things Open 2021 18, 19 Oct 2021 Regiser Free + In-person EST    Dashcon 2021 26, 27 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Github Universe 2021 27, 28 Oct 2021 Register Virtual (Free) PST    Azure Community Conference 29-31 Oct 2021 Regoster Virtual (Free) IST     November 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     ISTA 2021 18 Nov 2021 Register Virtual      December 2021    Conference/Workshop Date Link Mode Region / TimeZone Comments     Gophercon 2021 5-8 Dec 2021 Register  PST    AWS re:Invent 2021 Dec 2021 Register Paid PST     Missing any conference Do raise a pull request to this repo to add/update conference information.
